text: @GOP @SecretaryRoss Old person with disposable income here  👋👋👋  I am not going anywhere to spend it because #GOPComplicitTraitors and Trump* have allowed COVID-19 to spread unchecked. Last time I looked, your economy relied on people like me. 🤔
